meanings.definition: A person or thing that finishes something
meanings.sent1: The finisher completed the puzzle in record time.
meanings.sent2: The painter was the finisher of the masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The little robot was the finisher of the toy assembly line.
meanings.sent4: The marathon runner was a true finisher, crossing the line with a smile.
meanings.sent5: The finisher of the book left readers eager for the sequel.

meanings.definition: A product used to add a final touch or protective layer
meanings.sent1: She applied the finisher to the wood to protect it from scratches.
meanings.sent2: The car wax acted as a finisher, giving the vehicle a glossy shine.
meanings.sent3: The finisher spray made the cake look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The finisher coat on the floor made it gleam like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The nail polish served as the perfect finisher for her outfit.

meanings.definition: A horse that performs well in the final stretch of a race
meanings.sent1: The finisher surged ahead in the last lap of the race.
meanings.sent2: The jockey rode the finisher to victory in the derby.
meanings.sent3: The finisher horse had a playful trot even after the race.
meanings.sent4: The finisher stallion galloped like the wind towards the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered as the finisher crossed the finish line first.
